title: Why Croatia's capital wants to hold the best Christmas market
description: The festive events help to put cities on the map and attract millions of tourists.
content: Christmas markets are not just tradition across Europe, they are big businesses that give cities a huge economic boost every December. For Zagreb, the capital of Croatia, it is an effective way of attracting tourists outside of the country's main sum... [6216 chars]

title: University threatened with legal action after protest at event
description: Prof Alice Sullivan says her talk at the University of Bristol became like a "zombie apocalypse" during the protest.
content:
A leading academic, who led a recent government review into sex and gender data collection has threatened legal action against the University of Bristol, claiming it failed to protect her freedom of speech.
Prof Alice Sullivan has also written to the... [5370 chars]

title: Why our railways often seem to be in such chaos over Christmas
description: Parts of Britain’s rail network will close for engineering work over the festive period - but is that the right time to do it?
content:
At a rail yard near Milton Keynes, a group of men in orange outfits are making final checks on huge slabs of railway track, preparing them so that they are ready to be installed over Christmas and New Year.
At a time when many commuters stop work to ... [8284 chars]
